Message.Title: AmazonFresh Delivery Food Service
Message.Msg: First off it'll cost you $299 to sign up for the service ~ OUCH Free delivery on orders over $35 This is doomed idea before it even starts We tried HomeGrocer (partly owned by Amazon) and it wasn't all it was cracked up to be.
